GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.10.83
GSD.description:
mlxsw: spectrum: Protect driver from buggy firmware

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.83 by commit 90d0736876c50ecde1a3275636a06b9ddb1cace9, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 28b1987ef5064dd5c43538ba1168ef7b801f3cad. For more details please see the references link.
